segments.text: Then I must go-you have said it yourself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , you must stay ! I swear it , and the oath shall be kept .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I tell you I must go !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have spoken my mind , and can go anywhere now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ask you to pass through life at my side-to be my second self and best earthly companion .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll never again come to your side ; I am turn away now and can't return .
segments.speaker: S1
